Dropdown.description: A dropdown select component with search functionality, segmented tabs support, and various sizes and states.

type.description: Type of dropdown - default or search

options.description: Array of options with value and label properties

segments.description: Array of segment tabs for filtering (used with search type)

examples.name: Search With Segments
examples.code: <Dropdown label='Search with Segments' type='search' placeholder='Search groups' selectedSegment='group' />

examples.name: States
examples.code: <Dropdown label="Default" state="default" placeholder="Default state" options={[ { value: 'option1', label: 'Option 1' }, { value: 'option2', label: 'Option 2' }, ]} />

examples.name: States
examples.code: <Dropdown label="Error" state="error" error="This field has an error" placeholder="Error state" options={[ { value: 'option1', label: 'Option 1' }, { value: 'option2', label: 'Option 2' }, ]} />

examples.name: States
examples.code: <Dropdown label="Disabled" state="disabled" placeholder="Disabled state" options={[ { value: 'option1', label: 'Option 1' }, { value: 'option2', label: 'Option 2' }, ]} />

Tooltip.description: A tooltip component for displaying contextual information with various placements and styles.

heading.description: Optional heading text for the tooltip

placement.description: Placement of the tooltip relative to trigger

examples.name: Basic
examples.code: <Tooltip placement='top' align='center' color='white'>This is a basic tooltip</Tooltip>

examples.name: Dark Theme
examples.code: <Tooltip heading='Dark Tooltip' showClose=true primaryActionText='Learn more' secondaryActionText='Skip' placement='top' align='center' color='dark'>This is a tooltip with dark theme</Tooltip>

examples.name: With Actions
examples.code: <Tooltip heading='Tooltip Heading' primaryActionText='Learn more' secondaryActionText='Skip' placement='top' align='center' color='white'>This is a tooltip with action buttons</Tooltip>

examples.name: With Close Button
examples.code: <Tooltip heading='Tooltip Heading' showClose=true placement='top' align='center' color='white'>This is a tooltip with a close button</Tooltip>

examples.name: With Heading
examples.code: <Tooltip heading='Tooltip Heading' placement='top' align='center' color='white'>This is a tooltip with a heading</Tooltip>

ButtonGroup.description: A group of buttons displayed together with consistent spacing and styling.

buttons.description: Array of button configurations with id, label, variant, icon, and iconPosition

equalWidth.description: Whether all buttons should have equal width

examples.name: Equal Width
examples.code: <ButtonGroup equalWidth={true} buttons={[{ id: 'ghost', label: 'Button', variant: 'text', icon: 'add', iconPosition: 'leading' }, { id: 'outline', label: 'Button', variant: 'secondary', icon: 'add', iconPosition: 'leading' }, { id: 'filled', label: 'Button', variant: 'primary', icon: 'add', iconPosition: 'leading' }]} />

examples.name: Primary Set
examples.code: <ButtonGroup buttons={[{ id: 'ghost', label: 'Button', variant: 'text', icon: 'add', iconPosition: 'leading' }, { id: 'outline', label: 'Button', variant: 'secondary', icon: 'add', iconPosition: 'leading' }, { id: 'filled', label: 'Button', variant: 'primary', icon: 'add', iconPosition: 'leading' }]} />

DatePicker.description: A date picker component for selecting single dates or date ranges with various sizes and states.

label.description: Label text for the date picker

range.description: Whether to enable date range selection

disabled.description: Whether the date picker is disabled

error.description: Whether the date picker is in error state

onStartChange.description: Callback when start date changes (for range mode)

onEndChange.description: Callback when end date changes (for range mode)

examples.name: Date Range
examples.code: <DatePicker label='Date Range' placeholder='Start date â†’ End date' range=true />

examples.name: Date Range With Values
examples.code: <DatePicker label='Date Range' range=true startValue="new Date().toLocaleDateString()" endValue="new Date(Date.now() + 7 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000).toLocaleDateString()" />

StackedBarChart.description: A stacked bar chart component for displaying segmented data with customizable heights and legends.

data.description: Array of data items, each with a label and segments array

legend.description: Array of legend items with label and color

barHeight.description: Custom height for bars in pixels

SimpleColumnLayout.description: A simple two-column layout component for displaying rows of left and right content with optional striping.

rows.description: Array of row objects with left and right properties containing title, subtitle, and optional align

striped.description: Whether to apply alternating row background colors

Chicklet.description: Chicklet component built from Figma specifications. A small tag-like element with two variants (rectangular and pill-shaped) and interactive states.

label.description: The text content displayed in the chicklet

variant.description: Shape variant - rectangular (4px radius) or rounded (pill-shaped)

showClose.description: Whether to show the close icon

onClose.description: Callback when close icon is clicked

examples.name: Long Text
examples.code: <Chicklet label="This is a longer label text" variant="rectangular" />

RadioGroup.description: A radio button group component with support for horizontal and vertical layouts, different sizes, and disabled options.

name.description: Name attribute for the radio group

options.description: Array of radio options with value, label, and optional disabled property

examples.name: Default
examples.code: <RadioGroup name="default-radio" options={[ { value: 'option1', label: 'Option 1' }, { value: 'option2', label: 'Option 2' }, { value: 'option3', label: 'Option 3' }, ]} defaultValue="option1" size="md" orientation="vertical" />

examples.name: Small
examples.code: <RadioGroup name="small-radio" options={[ { value: 'option1', label: 'Option 1' }, { value: 'option2', label: 'Option 2' }, { value: 'option3', label: 'Option 3' }, ]} size="sm" orientation="vertical" />

examples.name: Controlled
examples.code: <RadioGroup name="controlled-radio" options={[ { value: 'option1', label: 'Option 1' }, { value: 'option2', label: 'Option 2' }, { value: 'option3', label: 'Option 3' }, ]} value="option2" size="md" orientation="vertical" />

examples.name: Horizontal
examples.code: <RadioGroup name="horizontal-radio" options={[ { value: 'option1', label: 'Option 1' }, { value: 'option2', label: 'Option 2' }, { value: 'option3', label: 'Option 3' }, ]} orientation="horizontal" size="md" />

examples.name: With Disabled
examples.code: <RadioGroup name="disabled-radio" options={[ { value: 'small', label: 'Small' }, { value: 'medium', label: 'Medium' }, { value: 'large', label: 'Large' }, { value: 'xlarge', label: 'Extra Large', disabled: true }, ]} defaultValue="medium" size="md" orientation="vertical" />

Checkbox.description: A flexible checkbox component with support for labels, descriptions, error states, and indeterminate state.

error.description: Whether the checkbox is in error state

indeterminate.description: Whether the checkbox is in indeterminate state

description.description: Additional description text below the checkbox

examples.name: Checked
examples.code: <Checkbox label="Marketing emails" description="Get promotional offers and special discounts" checked />

examples.name: Checked
examples.code: <Checkbox label="Required field" error description="This field must be checked to continue" />

examples.name: Disabled Checked
examples.code: <Checkbox label='Disabled checked checkbox' disabled=true checked=true size='md' />

examples.name: Error
examples.code: <Checkbox label='Checkbox with error' error=true description='This field is required' size='md' />

examples.name: Newsletter Subscription
examples.code: <Checkbox label="Newsletter subscription" description="Receive weekly updates about new features and products" />

examples.name: With Description
examples.code: <Checkbox label='Checkbox with description' description='This is additional information about the checkbox option' size='md' />

Spacer.description: A spacing component for creating consistent vertical or horizontal spacing between elements.

size.description: Size of the spacer (x1: 4px, x2: 8px, x3: 12px, x4: 16px, x5: 20px, x6: 24px, x7: 28px, x8: 32px, x9: 36px, x10: 40px, x11: 44px, x12: 48px)

horizontal.description: Whether the spacer is horizontal (width) or vertical (height)

Button.description: A versatile button component with multiple variants, sizes, and icon support. Built with consistent theming and proper spacing.

variant.description: Visual style variant of the button

size.description: Size of the button (xxs: 16px, xs: 24px, sm: 32px, md: 40px, lg: 48px, xl: 56px, xxl: 64px)

iconPosition.description: Position of the icon relative to text

loading.description: Whether the button is in loading state

examples.name: All Variants
All Sizes

Divider.description: A divider component for separating content sections with different visual styles.

type.description: The type of divider to display

label.description: Label to display in the middle of the divider (only for type="with-label")

Avatar.description: Avatar component with multiple size options matching Figma specifications.

src.description: Image source URL for the avatar

alt.description: Alt text for the avatar image

Typography.description: ðŸŽ¨ **Typography Component** - Reusable text component with exact Figma specifications. Perfect for AI tools, development, and design documentation. Use this for all text rendering needs.

examples.name: Body-secondary-medium
examples.code: <Typography variant="body-secondary-medium">Body Secondary Medium - Small highlighted text</Typography>

examples.name: Body-secondary-regular
examples.code: <Typography variant="body-secondary-regular">Body Secondary Regular - Small supporting text</Typography>

examples.name: Body-secondary-semibold
examples.code: <Typography variant="body-secondary-semibold">Body Secondary Semibold - Small important text</Typography>

Switch.description: A toggle switch component with exact Figma specifications. Supports different sizes and states.

examples.name: Disabled Checked
examples.code: <Switch label='Disabled checked switch' disabled=true checked=true size='md' />

SubText.description: A sub-text component for displaying secondary information. Can optionally include a check icon.

icon.description: Whether to show the check icon

Text.description: A flexible text component with configurable icons and sub-text. Supports various sizes and icon positions.

examples.name: With Sub Text And Leading Icon
With Sub Text And Trailing Icon

Statistic.description: A statistic component for displaying numerical values with labels. Supports different label placements.

label.description: The label text for the statistic

Badge.description: A versatile badge component matching exact Figma specifications. Built with consistent theming and proper spacing.

variant.description: The visual style variant of the badge

icon.description: Optional icon name to display in the badge

onClick.description: Makes the badge interactive when provided

examples.name: All Variants
examples.code: NormalDangerSuccessWarningNeutral

examples.name: Interactive
examples.code:
function Preview() { const [isHovered, setIsHovered] = React.useState(false); const handleEnter = function() { setIsHovered(true); }; const handleLeave = function() { setIsHovered(false); }; return (
Hover me{isHovered && (
This is a tooltip
)}
); }

Tabs.description: Tab component with three variants (Primary, Secondary, Tertiary) built from Figma specifications. Supports badges, icons, and notifications.

tabs.description: Array of tab objects with label, optional badge, badgeCount, icon, and notification properties

onTabChange.description: Callback when tab changes, receives tab index

examples.name: FigmaVariants
examples.code: <Tabs type="primary" tabs={[ { label: 'Unselected' }, { label: 'Selected' }, { label: 'Another Tab' } ]} activeTab={1} showLine={true} />

examples.name: FigmaVariants
examples.code: <Tabs type="primary" tabs={[ { label: 'Dashboard', badge: true, badgeCount: '8' }, { label: 'Messages', badge: true, badgeCount: '56' }, { label: 'Settings', badge: true, badgeCount: '2' } ]} activeTab={0} showLine={true} />

examples.name: FigmaVariants
examples.code: <Tabs type="primary" tabs={[ { label: 'Home', icon: true }, { label: 'Alerts', notification: true }, { label: 'Profile', icon: true, badge: true, badgeCount: '3' } ]} activeTab={1} showLine={true} />

examples.name: FigmaVariants
examples.code: <Tabs type="secondary" tabs={[ { label: 'Overview' }, { label: 'Analytics' }, { label: 'Reports' } ]} activeTab={1} showLine={false} />

examples.name: FigmaVariants
examples.code: <Tabs type="secondary" tabs={[ { label: 'Active', badge: true, badgeCount: '12' }, { label: 'Pending', icon: true, notification: true }, { label: 'Completed', icon: true } ]} activeTab={0} showLine={false} />

examples.name: FigmaVariants
examples.code: <Tabs type="tertiary" tabs={[ { label: 'All' }, { label: 'Active' }, { label: 'Inactive' } ]} activeTab={0} showLine={false} />

examples.name: FigmaVariants
examples.code: <Tabs type="tertiary" tabs={[ { label: 'Draft', badge: true, badgeCount: '4' }, { label: 'Review', notification: true }, { label: 'Published', icon: true } ]} activeTab={1} showLine={false} />

Card.description: Flexible card component with configurable content sections. Supports basic and advanced layouts with eyebrow, header, body, and footer sections.

Input.description: Input component with multiple variants, sizes, and states. Supports labels, placeholders, icons, and validation.

type.description: Input type (text, email, password, tel, etc.)

examples.name: Default
examples.code: <Input label="Full Name" placeholder="Enter your full name" />

examples.name: Mandatory
examples.code: <Input label="Email Address" placeholder="Enter your email" type="email" labelMandatory />

examples.name: Optional
examples.code: <Input label="Middle Name" placeholder="Enter your middle name" labelOptional />

examples.name: With Suffix Icon
examples.code: <Input label="Phone Number" placeholder="Enter your phone number" type="tel" labelSuffixIcon />

examples.name: Error State
examples.code: <Input label="Email" placeholder="Enter email" error="This field is required" />

Upload.description: A comprehensive upload component supporting drag-and-drop, button, and thumbnail upload types with progress tracking and validation.

NavigationPopover.description: Highly configurable navigation popover that can mix hero illustrations, metric summaries, and deep sub-menusâ€”similar to launchers in modern design systems.

UploadZone.description: Drag and drop upload zone component for file selection and upload. Supports file validation, multiple file selection, and interactive states with customizable file type restrictions.

FileTypeIcon.description: File type icon component for displaying file format indicators (XLS, XLSX, CSV, PDF, DOC, DOCX, PNG, JPEG, JPG) with proper gradients, colors, and error states.

AppHeader.description: Application header component with FreightTiger logo on the left, notifications, and user profile. User profile shows company-specific logo (Tata Motors by default).

examples.name: Default
examples.code: <AppHeader name='Santosh Kumar' role='Dispatch Manager' location='SPD-Santoshnagar' badge='Admin' avatar='https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1472099645785-5658abf4ff4e?w=100&h=100&fit=crop&crop=face' name='tata-motors' displayName='Tata Motors' />

examples.name: Admin User
examples.code: <AppHeader name='John Doe' role='Administrator' location='MUM-Central' badge='Admin' avatar='https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1500648767791-00dcc994a43e?w=100&h=100&fit=crop&crop=face' name='tata-motors' displayName='Tata Motors' />

examples.name: Long User Name
examples.code: <AppHeader name='Alexandrina Montgomery-Richardson' role='Senior Operations Manager' location='HYD-Headquarters' badge='Senior' avatar='https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1438761681033-6461ffad8d80?w=100&h=100&fit=crop&crop=face' name='tata-motors' displayName='Tata Motors' />

examples.name: Manager User
examples.code: <AppHeader name='Jane Smith' role='Fleet Manager' location='DEL-North' badge='Manager' avatar='https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1494790108755-2616b612e120?w=100&h=100&fit=crop&crop=face' name='tata-motors' displayName='Tata Motors' />

examples.name: Mobile View
examples.code: <AppHeader size='Default' device='Mobile' name='Mobile User' role='Field Manager' location='PUN-Mobile' badge='Field' name='tata-motors' displayName='Tata Motors' />

examples.name: User With Avatar
examples.code: <AppHeader name='Sarah Wilson' role='Fleet Manager' location='BLR-Central' badge='Manager' avatar='https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1494790108755-2616b612e120?w=64&h=64&fit=crop&crop=face' name='ft' displayName='FreightTiger' />

examples.name: User With F T Company
examples.code: <AppHeader name='Rahul Singh' role='Operations Manager' location='BLR-Tech Hub' badge='Senior' avatar='https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1507003211169-0a1dd7228f2d?w=100&h=100&fit=crop&crop=face' name='ft' displayName='FreightTiger' />

examples.name: UserCompanyVariations
examples.code: <AppHeader user={{ name: 'Sarah Wilson', role: 'System Administrator', location: 'HYD-Headquarters', badge: 'Super Admin', }} userCompany={{ name: 'tata-motors', displayName: 'Tata Motors' }} />

examples.name: UserCompanyVariations
examples.code: <AppHeader user={{ name: 'Michael Chen', role: 'Fleet Manager', location: 'CHN-Central', badge: 'Manager', }} userCompany={{ name: 'ft', displayName: 'FreightTiger' }} />

UploadButton.description: A button component for file uploads with different states.

ThemeSystem.description: Complete theme system supporting Light, Dark, and Night modes with automatic component adaptation.

examples.name: Theme Provider
examples.code: import { ThemeProvider } from '@chetanft/design_system'; function App() { return ( <ThemeProvider> {/* Your app components */} </ThemeProvider> ); }

FileValidationCard.description: A card component displaying file validation status and statistics.

examples.name: C S V File
examples.code: <FileValidationCard fileName='data-export.csv' fileType='csv' uploadedAt={new Date()} validationStatus='success' validationStats={{total: 1250, success: 1250, invalid: 0}} onDelete={() => console.log('Delete clicked')} onDownload={() => console.log('Download clicked')} />

examples.name: Failed
examples.code: <FileValidationCard fileName='File 178.xlsx' fileType='excel' uploadedAt={new Date()} validationStatus='failed' validationStats={{total: 850, success: 0, invalid: 850}} onDelete={() => console.log('Delete clicked')} onDownload={() => console.log('Download clicked')} onViewDetails={() => console.log('View details clicked')} />

examples.name: Partially Processed
examples.code: <FileValidationCard fileName='File 178.xlsx' fileType='excel' uploadedAt={new Date()} validationStatus='partial' validationStats={{total: 850, success: 595, invalid: 255}} onDelete={() => console.log('Delete clicked')} onDownload={() => console.log('Download clicked')} onViewDetails={() => console.log('View details clicked')} />

examples.name: Success
examples.code: <FileValidationCard fileName='File 178.xlsx' fileType='excel' uploadedAt={new Date()} validationStatus='success' validationStats={{total: 850, success: 850, invalid: 0}} onDelete={() => console.log('Delete clicked')} onDownload={() => console.log('Download clicked')} onViewDetails={() => console.log('View details clicked')} />

examples.name: Validating
examples.code: <FileValidationCard fileName='File 178.xlsx' fileType='excel' uploadedAt={new Date()} validationStatus='validating' onDelete={() => console.log('Delete clicked')} />

FileCard.description: Comprehensive file management card component for displaying file information, processing states, statistics, and actions. Supports various file processing workflows with progress tracking and error handling.

examples.name: Default
examples.code: <FileCard fileName='File 178.xlsx' fileType='XLS' status='processed' fileDate='12 April 2024, 5:30 PM' variant='compact' />

examples.name: File Too Large
examples.code: <FileCard fileName='File 178.xlsx' fileType='XLS' status='too-large' progress=23 variant='with-progress' onClose="() => alert('Cancel')" />

examples.name: Fully Processed
examples.code: <FileCard fileName='File 178.xlsx' fileType='XLS' status='processed' fileDate='12 April 2024, 5:30 PM' variant='with-stats' onDownload="() => alert('Download')" onPreview="() => alert('Preview')" onDelete="() => alert('Delete')" />

examples.name: Template Mismatch
examples.code: <FileCard fileName='File 178.xlsx' fileType='XLS' status='template-mismatch' fileDate='12 April 2024, 5:30 PM' errorMessage='Missing required column: Origin. Please use the sample template' onDelete="() => alert('Delete')" />

examples.name: Template Mismatch
examples.code: <FileCard fileName="File 178.xlsx" fileType="XLS" status="template-mismatch" fileDate="12 April 2024, 5:30 PM" errorMessage="Missing required column: Origin. Please use the sample template" />

examples.name: Unsupported
examples.code: <FileCard fileName="File 178.txt" fileType="!" status="unsupported" fileDate="12 April 2024, 5:30 PM" />

examples.name: Unsupported Format
examples.code: <FileCard fileName='File 178.txt' fileType='!' status='unsupported' fileDate='12 April 2024, 5:30 PM' onDelete="() => alert('Delete')" />

examples.name: Upload Failed
examples.code: <FileCard fileName='File 178.xlsx' fileType='XLS' status='upload-failed' progress=23 variant='with-progress' onRefresh="() => alert('Retry')" onDelete="() => alert('Delete')" />

examples.name: Uploading
examples.code: <FileCard fileName='File 178.xlsx' fileType='XLS' status='uploading' progress=23 variant='with-progress' onClose="() => alert('Cancel upload')" />

examples.name: Validating
examples.code: <FileCard fileName='File 178.xlsx' fileType='XLS' status='validating' fileDate='12 April 2024, 5:30 PM' onClose="() => alert('Cancel')" />

examples.name: Validating
examples.code: <FileCard fileName="File 178.xlsx" fileType="XLS" status="validating" fileDate="12 April 2024, 5:30 PM" />

examples.name: With-stats
examples.code: <FileCard fileName="File 178.xlsx" fileType="XLS" status="processed" fileDate="12 April 2024, 5:30 PM" variant="with-stats" stats={{ total: 100, success: 100, invalid: 0 }} />

examples.name: With-stats
examples.code: <FileCard fileName="File 178.xlsx" fileType="XLS" status="partially-processed" fileDate="12 April 2024, 5:30 PM" variant="with-stats" stats={{ total: 100, success: 60, invalid: 40 }} />

FileThumbnail.description: Compact file thumbnail component for displaying file previews or file type icons. Supports hover states with action icons for preview and download. Based on Figma design specifications.

imageUrl.description: Optional image preview URL. If not provided, shows file type icon.

showFileName.description: Whether to display the filename below the thumbnail

examples.name: With Actions
examples.code: <FileThumbnail fileName='Image2.png' imageUrl="sampleImageUrl" showFileName=true onPreview="() => alert('Preview file')" onDownload="() => alert('Download file')" />

ReadOnly.description: A read-only field display component for showing label-value pairs in different layouts. Based on Figma design specifications.

Colors.description: Color palette and theme system showcase with live theme switching capabilities.

ColorSystem.description: Complete color system showing primary, secondary, and semantic colors organized by theme mode.

examples.name: Color System
examples.code: // Access design tokens: const { designTokens } = require('@chetanft/design_system'); // Use colors: const primaryColor = designTokens.colors.primary; const secondaryColor = designTokens.colors.secondary;

Label.description: Form label component with support for mandatory indicators, optional text, and suffix icons. Based on Figma design specifications.

examples.name: Long Text
examples.code: <Label mandatory=true suffixIcon=true>This is a very long label text that might wrap to multiple lines</Label>

Collapsible.description: Collapsible component with multiple variants for showing/hiding content.

examples.name: Default
examples.code: <Collapsible header='Collapsible header' bg='Secondary' type='Primary' badges=false isExpanded=false>p-4</Collapsible>

ProgressList.description: A progress list component that matches the exact Figma timeline design with proper 3-column layout (Time | Path | Content), point types, and badge system.

examples.name: Badge Variants
examples.code: <ProgressList id='1' title='Normal Badges' description='Standard information badges' state='completed' pointType='icon' lineType='solid' icon='check' label='TAT: 3 hrs' variant='normal' label='Run time: 2 hr 30 min' variant='normal' id='2' title='Danger Badges' description='Warning and error badges' state='current' pointType='primary' lineType='solid' label='30 min' icon='clock' variant='danger' label='Detained' variant='danger' label='Long Stoppage' variant='danger' />

examples.name: Figma Timeline No Time
